title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-3.6 - Deviation from premium credit amount
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-3.6 - Deviation from premium credit amount

State Regulations

An insurer, upon written application to the superintendent, may deviate from the credit, provided that the superintendent approves the deviation in accordance with, and pursuant to, the standards set forth in Insurance Law, article 23. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
151-3.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
